# MarkdownPDFConverter

> The Best Free AI Markdown to PDF & PDF to Markdown Converter.

## Overview
MarkdownPDFConverter is a web-based tool that allows users to convert Markdown files to PDF and PDF files to Markdown. It emphasizes privacy (client-side processing), ease of use (no sign-up), and aesthetic quality (AI-powered styling).

## Core Capabilities

### Markdown to PDF
- **Real-time Preview**: See changes instantly.
- **Templates**: Professional templates (Minimal, Resume, Academic).
- **AI Styling**: Natural language prompts to customize CSS.
- **GFM Support**: Tables, checklists, code blocks.

### PDF to Markdown
- **AI Extraction**: Reconstructs Markdown structure from PDFs.
- **Accuracy**: Preserves tables and code blocks.
- **Privacy**: Documents are processed securely.

## Navigation
- Tool Home: https://markdownpdfconverter.com
- Pricing: https://markdownpdfconverter.com/#pricing
- Blog: https://markdownpdfconverter.com/blog
- Docs: https://markdownpdfconverter.com/docs
- Cheatsheet: https://markdownpdfconverter.com/cheatsheet

## Technical Details
- Built with: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, jsPDF, html2canvas, Vercel AI SDK.
- Host: Vercel.
- Privacy: Browser-based rendering.
